uxn.comment: Since uxn word size is 16 we expect such big literals to get truncated accordingly. 1000000 == 0xf4240 -> 16960 == 0x4240. 123456789987654321 == 0x1b69b4be052fab1 -> 64177 == 0xfab1

6502.comment: Since 6502 word size is 16 we expect such big literals to get truncated accordingly. 1000000 == 0xf4240 -> 16960 == 0x4240. 123456789987654321 == 0x1b69b4be052fab1 -> 64177 == 0xfab1
